data.title: How to submit a science amendment
data.excerpt: There are several reasons to notify the Department via a science amendment. This includes transitioning a provisional license to an annual license, submitting documentation for a provisional license renewal review, or proposed physical modifications to the licensed premises. Download this guide for a detailed overview of the process.
